title: Jest Unit Testing Setup
description:
Configure Jest Unit Testing Framework with Coverage Requirements

Set up Jest as the testing framework for the project with enforced code coverage thresholds to ensure adequate test quality.

Requirements:
- Install Jest and necessary dependencies (@types/jest, ts-jest if TypeScript)
- Create jest.config.js with appropriate configuration for the project type
- Configure coverage collection with minimum thresholds set to 85% for:
  - Statements
  - Branches
  - Functions
  - Lines
- Set up test file patterns and directories to scan
- Configure module resolution to match project structure
- Add test scripts to package.json (test, test:watch, test:coverage)
- Exclude appropriate files/directories from coverage (node_modules, dist, config files)
- Set up test environment (node, jsdom, etc.) based on project needs
- Configure reporter output for CI/CD integration
- Ensure tests fail when coverage thresholds are not met
